name: llamafarm
description: LlamaFarm project management, RAG queries, and AI chat. Provides tools for managing projects, querying vector databases, and interacting with AI models.

prerequisites: LlamaFarm services must be running (use /start or `lf start`)

provided.name: list_projects
provided.description: List all LlamaFarm projects in a namespace

provided.name: create_project
provided.description: Create a new LlamaFarm project with configuration

provided.name: chat_completions
provided.description: Send messages to AI models with optional RAG context

provided.name: list_models
provided.description: Get available AI models from configuration
